item.title: ‘Chief of War’ Review: Jason Momoa’s Sometimes Rousing, Sometimes Meandering Apple TV+ Historical Epic
item.description: The ‘Game of Thrones’ alum co-created and stars in the sweeping, action-packed drama about the unification of Hawaii in the 18th and 19th centuries.
